author: cutting
msg: Fix bugs when jar is included with job.  Make workDir before trying to
unpack jar into it.  Also use full path names in classpath.

author: sgala
msg: Unusual situation: if a fragment is null, it can try to raise a FragmentNotInLayoutException, but this will in turn raise an ExceptionInInitializerError, which is not caught, spoiling the whole rendering process. It happened here.

author: akarasulu
msg: checking in stefans code from DIREVE-225
